    • Method Detail

      • InitPythonPowerFactory

        public static void InitPythonPowerFactory(java.lang.String grid,
                                          java.lang.String simulationPath)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Initialisation of the communication between PowerFactory and JAVA. It executes the Python script "InterfaceJavaPowerFactory.py"
        Parameters:
        grid - : PowerFactory grid name ("SimpleGrid1.1.1", "SimpleGrid2.1.1", "SimpleGrid3.1.1", "SimpleGrid4.1.1", "Simplified_ELVT", "Simplified_ELVT_saved")
        simulationPath - : used to export errors or warnings from PowerFactory
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • SimPowerFactory

        @Deprecated
public static void SimPowerFactory(double stepSize,
                                                double tStart,
                                                double tStop)
        Deprecated. 
        Simulation directly with Inc and Sim object from PowerFactory
        Parameters:
        stepSize - : stepsize from the PowerFactory simulation
        tStart - : start time (in second) of the PowerFactory simulation
        tStop - : end time (in second) of the PowerFactory simulation This function is not used in the final version. the SimPowerFactoryScript method is used instead

      • SimPowerFactoryScript

        public static void SimPowerFactoryScript(double stepSize,
                                         double tStart,
                                         double tStop,
                                         java.lang.String PInputFile,
                                         java.lang.String SoE0File,
                                         java.lang.String RatepvsFile)
                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                         PowerFactoryException
        cf Simulation script of Python in the manual
        Parameters:
        stepSize - : stepsize from the PowerFactory simulation
        tStart - : start time (in second) of the PowerFactory simulation
        tStop - : end time (in second) of the PowerFactory simulation
        PInputFile - : path of the file to communicate the EVs charging power from JAVA to PowerFactory
        SoE0File - : path of the file to communicate the initial state of energy of batteries from JAVA to PowerFactory
        RatepvsFile - : path of the file to communicate the PV rate from JAVA to PowerFactory
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - : throw by PowerFactoryParameters method called
        PowerFactoryException - : is throw if Python detects errors or warnings in the execution of the PowerFactory simulation

      • GetResultsFiles

        public static void GetResultsFiles()
        Get results files path defined in PowerFactory (results object) and send them to PowerFactoryResults class

      • DefineBatteryState

        @Deprecated
public static void DefineBatteryState(java.lang.String PInputObject,
                                                   double power)
        Deprecated. 
        Unused in the final version. Change a battery charging power
        Parameters:
        PInputObject - : PowerFactory path of the battery
        power - : new charging power

        public static void pipe(java.lang.String msg)
